Business Information: ACRI is a 4 physician office of colon and rectal surgeons. We specialize in all facets of colon and rectal surgery including anorectal and laparoscopic surgery and colonoscopy. www.acripc.com
ACRI is a 4 physician office of colon and rectal surgeons. We specialize in all facets of colon and rectal surgery including anorectal and laparoscopic surgery and colonoscopy. www.acripc.com

Alabama Colon & Rectal Institute (ACRI) is a free standing, private practice in downtown Birmingham, Alabama with four board-certified Colon and Rectal Surgeons. Our practice is limited to diseases of the colon, rectum and anus. We perform surgery at multiple sites including five local hospitals and outpatient operations at our AAAASF nationally accredited office-based surgical facility. ACRI provides quality colon and rectal surgical care, colonoscopy and transrectal ultrasound services in an efficient and cost conscious manner. Our major goals are to provide these services in an environment which will assure our patients privacy, confidentiality, and above all, their satisfaction and safety.

Business Name: Colon & Rectal Surgical Associates of Birmingham

Business Information: Alabama Colon & Rectal Institute (ACRI) is a practice serving the residents of Birmingham, Ala. and surrounding areas. The practice performs surgery at multiple sites including five local hospitals and outpatient operations at its AAAASF (American Association for Accreditation of Ambulatory Surgery Facilities) nationally accredited office-based surgical facility. It provides colon and rectal surgical care along with colonoscopy and transrectal ultrasound services. Alabama Colon & Rectal Institute (ACRI) is a national preceptor for Ethicon on two procedures (PPH for hemorrhoids and STARR for obstructive defecation syndrome).

Alabama Colon & Rectal Institute (ACRI) is a free standing, private practice in downtown Birmingham, Alabama with four board-certified Colon and Rectal Surgeons. Our practice is limited to diseases of the colon, rectum and anus. We perform surgery at multiple sites including five local hospitals and outpatient operations at our AAAASF nationally accredited office-based surgical facility. ACRI provides quality colon and rectal surgical care, colonoscopy and transrectal ultrasound services in an efficient and cost conscious manner. Our major goals are to provide these services in an environment which will assure our patients privacy, confidentiality, and above all, their satisfaction and safety.
